title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.9 - Allowance for tools and supplies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.9 - Allowance for tools and supplies

State Regulations

No allowance for tools and supplies required by the
employer for the maintenance of the building shall be permitted as part of the
minimum wage. Where an employee advances the cost of such tools or supplies, he
shall be reimbursed no later than the time of the next payment of
wages. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
141-1.9

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
